archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.2.4f: f) sharing threat intelligence and collaborating with third parties (e.g. ISPs, security analysts, government and industry regulators, law enforcement and intelligence agencies).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
